author: Team Mapbox <hello@mapbox.com>
description:
( https://www.mapbox.com/blog/simplified-system-for-building-map-interactions?utm_campaign=Geofencing+%7C+Fitness+%26+Outdoors+%7C+May+1%2C+2025&utm_content=Geofencing+%7C+Fitness+%26+Outdoors+%7C+May+1%2C+2025&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io )

******************************************************
Announcing: Mapbox Geofencing for Outdoors and Fitness
******************************************************

The new Mapbox Geofencing API makes it simpler for outdoors and fitness map developers to configure and manage geofenced areas and monitor when a device enters, exits, or remains within defined boundaries.

Geofences could be used to:

*
Ensure compliance with local rules by issuing alerts when users enter protected sites.
* Keep users safe by issuing alerts when they enter dangerous areas like high fire-risk zones.
* Issue alerts when users are nearing milestones along a route. Or help family members at home track users along their route.

Mapbox Geofencing
title: Announcing: Mapbox Geofencing for Outdoors & Fitness
